about.title: About
about.body: Hi, I'm Ludvig—a self-taught programmer and first-year M.Sc. student in Industrial Engineering and Management at KTH. Alongside my studies, I'm a software developer at THS Business, helping KTH students connect with future employers. I'm currently expanding my skills in full-stack development and leveraging AI tools like Cursor and ChatGPT to assist in coding.

ths.title: THS Business
ths.desc1: Focusing on frontend development but also doing fullstack.
ths.desc2: Developing a platform for KTH students to connect with future employers.

atlas-copco.title: Atlas Copco
atlas-copco.desc1: Developed the front end of a joint management application using technologies such as React, TypeScript, Vite, BulmaCSS and Docker.
atlas-copco.desc2: Contributed to project documentation and successfully assisted in the project handover to a colleague for continued development.

kth.title: KTH Royal Institute of Technology
kth.desc1: One of Europe's leading technical universities, ranked 95th in the world.
kth.desc2: 300 ECTS of courses in Mathematics, Computer Science and Industrial Economics and Management.

odin.title: The Odin Project
odin.desc1: A free and open source curriculum for learning modern web development that I took during my gap year.
odin.desc2: I learned fullstack web development with technologies like JavaScript, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, React, Next.js, Node.js, Express, MongoDB etc...

ng.title: Nacka Gymnasium
ng.undertitle: High School Diploma, Natural Science Programme
ng.desc2: Specialization in maths, medicine, french and web development

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.shortDescription: My website displaying my knowledge, experiences, tech-stack and a little about me.
portfolio.longDescription: A website that I built to display my knowledge, experiences, tech-stack and a little about me. Examples of technologies used are Next.js and Typescript for frontend, Tailwind CSS for styling and i18n for language support.

e-commerce.title: E-commerce
e-commerce.shortDescription: A fullstack e-commerce website with Stripe payment integration.
e-commerce.longDescription: A fullstack e-commerce website with store page and admin dashboard. The website is built with technologies like Next.js, Shadcn UI, Tailwind CSS, TypeScript, Express, Drizzle ORM and Stripe for payment integration.
